Description of incident: 6,400 people who were in-patients at St. Luke's are being warned that their name, Social Security number and other information may have landed in the hands of thieves, due to a stolen laptop computer. All of the at-risk individuals were cared for there at some point by a hospitalist, a physician other than the patient's primary care doctor, who works for an independent physician group called Cogent Healthcare. The computer was stolen from a locked office in a secure physician office building that is located adjacent to the hospital; the computer belonged to an employee of Cogent Healthcare of Wisconsin.
